channel.title: farming for bits
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "farming for bits" - I need some recommendations for where to farm for bits

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
y can use : Raging - Passionate - Dance Floor.
it give y @field diff (+/-)115.

item.title: farming for bits
item.content:encoded: I have been following the guide's recommendation for using Cursed Delicious Dealer's Room to farm for bits. I was wondering if there are any higher level fields that also have a tendency to drop lots of bits. any advice would be appreciated.
